title: Chlorinated-Ti3C2TF as Dual Functional Buried-Interface on SnO2 Electron Transporting Layer for 25.09% High Performance n-i-p Perovskite Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00196F, Paper
Ji Cao, Qiaoyun Chen, Wenting Wu, Jianfei Fu, Zelong Zhang, Lei Chen, Rui Wang, Wei Yu, Lijie Wang, Xiaoting Nie, Jing Zhang, Yi Zhou, Bo Song, Yongfang Li
Fluorinated-titanium-carbide MXenes (Ti3C2TF) are proven as interfacial materials for hole transport layers in perovskite solar cells (pero-SCs). The surface terminals of Ti3C2TF can also be adjusted to regulate the work...
